verses.verse: The <S%H776>earth<s%> is <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%>'s, with its <S%H4393>fullness;<s%> the <S%H8398>world,<s%> and those who dwell <S%H3427>therein.<s%>
For he has <S%H3245>founded<s%> it on the <S%H3220>seas,<s%> and <S%H3559>established<s%> it on the <S%H5104>floods.<s%>
Who may <S%H5927>ascend<s%> to <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%>'s <S%H2022>hill?<s%> Who may <S%H6965>stand<s%> in his <S%H6944>holy<s%> <S%H4725>place?<s%>

He who has <S%H5355>clean<s%> <S%H3709>hands<s%> and a <S%H1249>pure<s%> <S%H3824>heart;<s%> who has not lifted <S%H5375>up<s%> his <S%H5315>soul<s%> to <S%H7723>falsehood,<s%> and has not <S%H7650>sworn<s%> <S%H4820>deceitfully.<s%>
He shall <S%H5375>receive<s%> a <S%H1293>blessing<s%> from <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> <S%H6666>righteousness<s%> from the <S%H430>God<s%> of his <S%H3468>salvation.<s%>
This is the <S%H1755>generation<s%> of those who <S%H1875>seek<s%> <S%H1245>Him,<s%> who seek your <S%H6440>face<s%>â€”even <S%H3290>Jacob.<s%> <S%H5542>Selah.<s%>

Lift <S%H5375>up<s%> your <S%H7218>heads,<s%> you <S%H8179>gates!<s%> Be lifted <S%H5375>up,<s%> you <S%H5769>everlasting<s%> <S%H8179>doors,<s%> and the <S%H4428>King<s%> of <S%H3519>glory<s%> will come <S%H935>in.<s%>
Who is the <S%H4428>King<s%> of <S%H3519>glory?<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H5808>strong<s%> and <S%H1368>mighty,<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H1368>mighty<s%> in <S%H4421>battle.<s%>

Lift <S%H5375>up<s%> your <S%H7218>heads,<s%> you <S%H8179>gates;<s%> <S%H5375>yes,<s%> lift them up, you <S%H5769>everlasting<s%> <S%H6607>doors,<s%> and the <S%H4428>King<s%> of <S%H3519>glory<s%> will come <S%H935>in.<s%>
Who is this <S%H4428>King<s%> of <S%H3519>glory?<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> of <S%H6635>Armies<s%> is the <S%H4428>King<s%> of <S%H3519>glory!<s%> <S%H5542>Selah.<s%>
